thread.title: D2hGrocery.com Brings Gourmet and Grocery Delivery to Noida with No Minimum Order Value
thread.title_full: D2hGrocery.com Brings Gourmet and Grocery Delivery to Noida with No Minimum Order Value

title: D2hGrocery.com Brings Gourmet and Grocery Delivery to Noida with No Minimum Order Value
text:
Friday, August 28, 2015 10:00AM IST (4:30AM GMT) D2hGrocery.com Brings Gourmet and Grocery Delivery to Noida with No Minimum Order Value Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India www.D2HGrocery.com is a new-age initiative that is helping make the customer’s grocery shopping experience quicker with high-speed delivery, wide inventory at the cheapest prices with their main USP of No Minimum Order Purchase Value . The portal has started delivery in Noida, Ghaziabad & Greater Noida Region & will deliver niche & everyday products such as Gourmet, Imported Ice Creams Grocery & Staples, Bakery & Dairy products, Beverages, Packaged Food, Pet & Baby Care products. It is one of the first grocery shopping portals in Noida which has a physical store spreading over 2500 sq. ft. in Sector 51, Noida. 
The CEO & Co-Founder Deepak Sangarpal comments on the launch “ Through D2hgrocery.com, we want to liberate the households of Noida from daily grocery shopping hassles & high prices. We have the widest range of gourmet food items available & provide same day delivery with no minimum order value if it’s ordered before afternoon since we stock our own items & are not aggregators .” Anurag Nayar – Co-Founder & COO commented on the inaugural scheme “ We have launched an inaugural offer of 5% flat off on all purchases if members register & buy before 31 st August 2015. We plan to expand to Delhi & NCR within 12 months to tap the growing demand of grocery shopping from the convenience of home.” About D2hGrocery.com 
Started by entrepreneurs Deepak Sangarpal, Anurag Nayar, Shilpi Gupta & Geeta Sangarpal, www.d2hgrocery.com was launched in July 2015. The company plans to have more than 9000 sq. ft. of retail space and around 10000 sq. ft. of ware house space. For News Release background on D2hGrocery.com click here Deepak Sangarpal, D2hGrocery.com, +91 (120) 4325760, Deepak.sangarpal@d2hretail.com
